msIdentifier.idno: Oxford, Sackler Library, Papyrology Rooms P. Oxy. 3381

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready. I preserved the submitted readings in ll.1-2 (they are from biblio 95408, which I have also added to bibliography). I encoded alternative supplements in ll. 3 and 11. Some commentary added and deleted, as well.

Finalized - Ready. I preserved the submitted readings in ll.1-2 (they are from biblio 95408, which I have also added to bibliography). I encoded alternative supplements in ll. 3 and 11. Some commentary added and deleted, as well.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some tidying needed. TEXT: restore transcription of ed.pr. in lines 1-2; in l.3 remove |ed| markup and insert .3 before ἐ]ν AND remove |ed| markup around Καμικῶι; in l.4 remove |ed| markup; in l.5 remove |ed| markup; in l.6 change the source for βαρβάρου to codd. (not Ad); in l.6 replace ε. at end of line with ε.1; in l.7 remove |ed| markup; in l.7 add comment that the papyrus excludes a sentence found in the mss. (ταῦτα οἱ Κρῆτες ὡς ἀπενειχθέντα ἤκουσαν, ἔσχοντο τῆς τιμωρίης); at end of l.9 move lambda of Σικελ to start of l.10 and place in square brackets as per ed.pr.; in ll.9-10 I’d note the trio of Attic dialectal forms in brief commentary rather than via |ed| markup (for, the readings aren’t new); place l.10 on its own line, too; in l.10 remove |ed| markup around the participle; in l.10 move last nu at end of line to start of l.11 and place in square brackets; in l.11 replace |ed| markup with |alt| markup (the choice is ἀνὰ vs. ἵνα); in l.11 βια[ίωι] > βια[ίω]; in l.12 remove |ed| markup; move to from end of l.12 to start of l.13 and place in square brackets; in l.17 remove |ed| markup and either change accent on Καμικόν to grave or insert a comma. META: Delete volume number from biblio 9607; replace biblio 82308 with 95519; update online resources link with http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3381--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH010b312d0b26d90db8798ef7; delete legacy name and change display name to P.Oxy. 48 3381; Herodotus is CWKB 915; add passage details to Author & Work section; MP3 is 480.1; script type can be simplified to informal capitals; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus in provenance and add Pleiades georef link https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some tidying needed. TEXT: restore transcription of ed.pr. in lines 1-2; in l.3 remove |ed| markup and insert .3 before ἐ]ν AND remove |ed| markup around Καμικῶι; in l.4 remove |ed| markup; in l.5 remove |ed| markup; in l.6 change the source for βαρβάρου to codd. (not Ad); in l.6 replace ε. at end of line with ε.1; in l.7 remove |ed| markup; in l.7 add comment that the papyrus excludes a sentence found in the mss. (ταῦτα οἱ Κρῆτες ὡς ἀπενειχθέντα ἤκουσαν, ἔσχοντο τῆς τιμωρίης); at end of l.9 move lambda of Σικελ to start of l.10 and place in square brackets as per ed.pr.; in ll.9-10 I’d note the trio of Attic dialectal forms in brief commentary rather than via |ed| markup (for, the readings aren’t new); place l.10 on its own line, too; in l.10 remove |ed| markup around the participle; in l.10 move last nu at end of line to start of l.11 and place in square brackets; in l.11 replace |ed| markup with |alt| markup (the choice is ἀνὰ vs. ἵνα); in l.11 βια[ίωι] > βια[ίω]; in l.12 remove |ed| markup; move to from end of l.12 to start of l.13 and place in square brackets; in l.17 remove |ed| markup and either change accent on Καμικόν to grave or insert a comma. META: Delete volume number from biblio 9607; replace biblio 82308 with 95519; update online resources link with http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3381--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH010b312d0b26d90db8798ef7; delete legacy name and change display name to P.Oxy. 48 3381; Herodotus is CWKB 915; add passage details to Author & Work section; MP3 is 480.1; script type can be simplified to informal capitals; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus in provenance and add Pleiades georef link https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.12 by Jesse Obert. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Completed for a Todd Hickey's class. Originally submitted on December 1st, but bounced due to a technical issue.“

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.12 by Jesse Obert. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Completed for a Todd Hickey's class. Originally submitted on December 1st, but bounced due to a technical issue.“

div.p: Neither margin is preserved, but Chambers' ed. pr. assumes that most lines are complete at the beginning, or are missing only half a letter.

div.ab:
ἔπεμψε μηνίων δακρύματα ὅτι
οἱ μὲν οὐ συνεξεπράξαντο
αὐτῶι τὸντῶν ἐν Καμικῶι θάνατονθάνατον γενόμενον
ὑμεῖς δὲ κείνοισικείνοισιν τὴν ἐκ Σπάρ
της ἁρπαχθεῖσαν ὑπ’ ἀνδρὸς
Δαρδάνουβαρβάρου γυναῖκα ἔχει δὲ ὧδε τὰ
εἶπε. λέγεται γὰρ Μίνων κα
τὰ ζήτησιν Δαιδάλου ἀπικόμεν
ον εἰς Σικανίαν τὴν νῦν Σικε
λίαν καλεομένην ἀποθα
νεῖν βιαίῳ θανάτωι ἀνὰἵνα δὲ χρόν
ον Κρῆτας θεοῦ σφε ἐποτρύναν
τος πάντας πλὴν Πολιχνιτέ
ων τε καὶ Πραισίων ἀπικομέ
νους στόλωιστόλωι μεγάλωι ἐς Σικανίην πολ
ιορκέειν ἐπ’ ἔτεα πέντε
πόλιν Καμικόν, τὴν

item.p: The papyrus here excludes a line found in the mss. tradition: ταῦτα οἱ Κρῆτες ὡς ἀπενειχθέντα ἤκουσαν, ἔσχοντο τῆς τιμωρίης.
The papyrus preserves a trio of Attic dialectal forms in ll. 9-10 instead of the expected Ionic ones (εἰς for ἐς; Σικανίαν for Σικανίην; Σικελίαν for Σικελίην).
